name: Rhythm Ball 3D
description:
Enjoy new ball game with great art and relaxing music

New addictive music game! Let’s install Rhythm Ball 3D and enjoy the simple gameplay to relax with the trending music genre: EDM, Deephouse, Trap, R&B, Pop, Rock...and more!

Try it now and enjoy fun time.

MAIN FEATURES:
* Easy gameplay and quick fitting.
* Game designed in 3D.
* A hundred level to challenging your skill.
* More cool art after beating levels.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Hold and Drag the ball to move left and right.
* Avoid obstacles.
* Try not to fail and match the music beats.

Try it, you will love it. More fun feature is coming soon.
